contentrichtext.text: {{Other uses}} {{Infobox French commune |name = Vendeuvre |image = Chparterre.jpg |caption = Gardens of the Chateau of Vendeuvre |region = Basse-Normandie |department = Calvados |arrondissement = Caen |canton = Morteaux-Coulibœuf |INSEE = 14735 |postal code = 14170 |mayor = Daniel Haghebaert |term = 2008–2014 |intercommunality = Trois Rivières |longitude = -0.0742 |latitude = 48.9919 |elevation m = 36 |elevation min m = 25 |elevation max m = 86 |area km2 = 26.31 |population = 742 |population date = 2008 }} {{Expand French|date=December 2008|Vendeuvre}} '''Vendeuvre''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Calvados]] [[Departments of France|department]] in the [[Basse-Normandie]] [[Regions of France|region]] in northwestern [[France]]. ==Population== {{Historical populations |align=left |1962|828 |1968|809 |1975|721 |1982|706 |1990|708 |1999|734 |2008|742 }} {{clear-left}} ==Sights== *[[Château de Vendeuvre]] and its gardens with labyrinth, cascades, kiosk, temple, cave with shells. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Calvados department]] ==References== *[http://www.insee.fr/en/home/home_page.asp INSEE] {{reflist}} {{Commons category|Vendeuvre}} {{Calvados communes}} [[Category:Communes of Calvados]] {{Calvados-geo-stub}}
